property.name: AttackBar
property.value: [Ranged] [Light] [Dice=2] [d12] [6-7 = Daze; 8+ = Daze & Burn] [Ethereal] [Unavoidable] [+2 vs. Nonliving Creatures]

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Claws: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=5] Toxic Spines: [Full] [Ranged:0-1] [Dice=2] [d12] [8+ = Cripple] [Piercing +1] Poison Stinger: [Full] [Melee] [Dice=2] [d12] [5-8 = Weak; 9+ = 2 Weak] [Piercing +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: When Bloodwave Greatbow is affected by a friendly command spell, his Greatbow attack gains Piercing +2 until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: As a Quick action, Royal Armorer may pay 1 mana to place an Armor +1 token on a soldier, knigt, or angel creature in his zone, which does not already have one.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bloodthirsty +0, Lumbering, Pest, Resilient, Psychic Immunity, Nonliving

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever Servant of Malacoda is melee attacked, he deals 2 direct poison damage to his attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: While he has damage on him, Silverclaw Ratel's Claws attack gains Doublestrike. Silverclaw Ratel cannot guard.

property.name: Text
property.value: For each Rage token on Dragonclaw Wolverine, he gains Armor +1. If he has 3+ Rage tokens, his Ripping Claws attack gains Counterstrike.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Claws of Fire: [Quick] [Melee] [Flame] [Dice=5] [d12] [5-8 = Burn; 9+ = 2 Burn] [Defrost] Scorching Heat: [Damage Barrier] [Flame] [Dice=2] [d12] [5-8 = Burn; 9+ = Burn & Daze] [Unavoidable]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Upkeep +1, Hydro +2, Incorporeal, Nonliving, Flame Immunity

property.name: Text
property.value: Hydro attacks gain the Ethereal trait against Fire Elemental

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Healing Light: [Full] [Ranged:0-2] [Heal] [Dice=2] [Heal target Living creature the amount rolled.] Staff of Smiting: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=3] [d12] [+2 vs. Nonliving Creatures] [+2 vs. Dark Creatures]

property.name: Text
property.value: Joseph Trublood gains Armor +2 against attacks from Nonliving or Dark creatures.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Electrified Mandibles: [Quick] [Melee] [Lightning] [Dice=3] [d12] [6-7 = Daze; 8+ = Stun] [Ethereal] Lightning Blast: [Full] [Ranged:0-1] [Lightning] [Dice=2] [d12] [7-8 = Daze; 9+ = Stun] [Ethereal]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Armor -X, Frost +X, Nonliving, Psychic Immunity, Slow, Uncontainable

property.name: Text
property.value: Magma Golem is immune to flame damage. When activated place a Burn condition on Magma Golem. Damage from Magma Golem's Burn conditions is instead dealt as direct flame damage to all other creatures in this zone. X = the number of Burn conditions on Magma Golem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Messenger of Bim-Shalla is Summoned, heal a friendly living creature within 1 zone the amount rolled on 4 attack dice.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Battering Horns: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=2] [d12] [9+ = Push] [+2 vs. Corporeal Conjurations]

property.name: Text
property.value: If Mountain Ram's Battering Horns attack gains a Charge bonus, then it also may add +3 to its effect die roll.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Cheetah takes two move actions immediately before it makes its Claws attack, it may add +8 to the effect die roll for that attack. It does not receive this bonus if it moves back and forth between 2 zone when it takes its move actions.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Flame Strike: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=1] [d12] [9+ = Burn]: Blazing Burst: [Ranged:0-0] [Zone Attack] [Flame] [d12] [5+ = Burn] [Unavoidable]

property.name: Text
property.value: Unstable Fire Imp may only makes the Blazing Burst attack if he is attacked and destroyed.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Victorian Griffin has the Flying trait, enemy creatures in its zone are hindered and the also lose and cannot gain the Elusive trait.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Holy Burst: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=5] [Ethereal] [Piercing +3] [Light] [d12] [5-8 = Daze; 9+ = Stun] [+2 vs. Nonliving Creatures]

property.name: Text
property.value: When an enemy creature receives a Daze or Stun condition marker from a light attack, they also receive 2 direct light damage. Do not ready Alfiya during the Ready Phase. Once per round, a cleric you control may spend a full action to pray and ready Alfiya.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Sherean Leviathan is in a zone with an aquatic terrain, enemy non-Mage non-aquatic creatures in this zone are restrained

property.name: Text
property.value: All creatures must pay 1 mana during the Declare Attack Step when making a melee or ranged attack

property.name: Text
property.value: Ballista starts with 1 Load token on it. Each Upkeep Phase, place 1 token on it (to a maximum or 2). Before or after any friendly Action Phase, you may remove 2 tokens to make its attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this zone has a friendly outpost in it, friendly soldier creatures may use a single move action to move up to 2 zones, to or from this zone and another zone with a friendly outpost in it. They move directly to the other zone, ignoring intervening walls and zones.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Toxic Gas: [Passage Attack] [Poison] [Dice=3] [d12] [5-9 = Daze; 10+ = Cripple] [Unavoidable] [Critical Damage]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Blocks LOS, Passage Attacks, Incorporeal, Wind +2, Extendable

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature is Restrained, and gains the Unmovable trait. Uncontainable creatures can be Restrained by Bind Spirit.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Obscured trait. Each time this creature is Hit by an attack, destroy Blur unless you pay 1 mana. Blur cannot be revealed during an Action Phase or Quickcast Action. [Obscured]

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Blinding Aura: [Damage Barrier] [Light] [Dice=1] [d12] [5-10 = Daze; 11+ = Stun] [Unavoidable] [Ethereal] [+2 vs. Nonliving]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains a Damage Barrier.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cowardice may only be revealed when this creature is activated. This creature cannot make a melee attack against a creature of a higher level.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature declares a non-spell attack, you must reveal Miss. That creature's attack fails andis canceled. Then, destroy Miss.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature is teleported outside the arena. When Sanctuary is destroyed, return the creature to play in the zone it was last in. You cannot reveal Sanctuary during an action or activation. If this is a minor creature, reduce the reveal cost of Sanctuary by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, all creatures in this zone receive 1 direct poison damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: The first melee attack this creature makes each round gains the Piercing +3 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature loses, and cannot gain, Melee +X traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature's melee attack gain the Mana Transfer +1 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: This conjuration gains Armor +1 and Innate Life +4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever your Mage summons a creature, he may place it in Summoning Circle's zone instead of his own zone, regardless of range or LoS.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a Nonliving creature enters this Mage's zone, it receives 1 direct light damage. At the end of this Mage's Action Phase, each Nonliving creature in his zone receives 1 direct light damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Acid -3 trait. [Armor +2] [Acid -3]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may re-roll all of the attack dice (but not the effect die) of one ranged attack he makes (including attack spells). If the attack action makes multiple attacks (such as a zone attack), he must choose just one attack to re-roll.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Mighty Bash: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=4] [+2 vs. Corporeal Conjurations] Returning Throw: [Full] [Ranged:0-1] [Dice=3] [d12] [8+ = Slam]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage may choose one additional spell during the Planning Phase. This gives him an additional spell choice each round (it does not give him an additional spell action).

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever a spell cast by this Mage, or an enchantment controlled by this Mage, provides healing for an object, other than the Regenerate trait, he may increase that amount of healing by one. He may use this ability once per round. If he heals multiple objects (such as with a Group Heal), he only get the +1 bonus for one object of his choice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains the Lighting +1 trait, a Damage Barrier, and Armor +2. [Armor +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains a Defense. Whenever this Defense successfully avoids an attack, Spiked Buckler's attack gains the Counterstrike trait until the end of that attack sequence. [Defense 8+ 1x No Ranged]

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase place a Storm token on Staff of Storms up to a maximum of 4. Whenever you make a wind or lightning attack, during the Roll Dice Step you may remove any number if Storm tokens to roll 1 additional attack die, and gain +1 to the effect die roll, per token removed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove as many psychic, Daze, or Stun conditions as you wish from the target, paying the removal cost for each one. Then, destroy as many revealed psychic enchantments from the target as you wish, paying the total mana cost (casting and reveal cost) for each one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round gains the Ethereal trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target non-Mage Living creature heals the amount rolled on 2 attack dice. Heal the caster of this spell the amount rolled on 2 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature the Bloodthirsty +2 trait until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round, if it has no damage type, and no effect die roll, gains all of the attack bar characteristics above; the flame damage type, an effect roll, and the Defrost trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round, if it has no damage type, and no effect die roll, gains all of the attack bar characteristics above; the lightning damage type, and an effect roll.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Hydro -2 trait. [Armor +2] [Hydro -2]
